Where is Vizicsacsi, who made Swain and Poppy top a meta? Where is Kikis, who had incredible picks on IEM, like Wukong or Twisted Fate? I think they - along with PoE - will be the most interesting players in this split... maybe not in the world, but I'm sure at least in EU.

Seconding that. I'm really happy that Keane with his midlane Heca made the list, but I'm missing Kikis and Vizicsacsi too. I think Gravity and UOL will be the two most interesting teams to watch this season.
